ai-mil7.3.6:1.1_0: “Have you been expelled? What should be realized?”
ai-mil7.3.6:1.2_0: “Great king, I don’t see many boats with knots as sweet, even-tempered, whirlpools,
ai-mil7.3.6:1.3_0: In the same way, there are persuasion of greed, hate, and delusion for the feeling born of greed, hate, and delusion that you should give them up.
ai-mil7.3.6:2.1_0: Furthermore, a boat is not dried up, withered loads when it sees the water in the water.
ai-mil7.3.6:2.2_0: In the same way, a cow with possessions who honor, respect, reverence, and veneration given to them.
ai-mil7.3.6:2.4_0: When you have spoken, great king, you’re in accordance with the Teaching,
ai-mil7.3.6:3.2_0: in the open, they shine no more.
